mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_MAIN = #{categoryMain}

SELECT B.B_NO , B.B_TITLE , B.B_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.COUNT , TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , A.ORIGIN_NAME , A.CHANGE_NAME , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS AT_FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY REF_BNO ORDER BY FILE_NO) AS RN FROM B_ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ) A ON (B.B_NO = A.REF_BNO) AND A.RN = 1 WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_MAIN = #{categoryMain} ORDER BY B.B_NO DESC

SELECT B.B_NO , B.B_TITLE , B.USER_NO , B.COUNT , TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , A.ORIGIN_NAME , A.CHANGE_NAME , A.FILE_PATH AS AT_FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN B_ATTACHMENT A ON (B.B_NO = A.REF_BNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_MAIN = '1' ORDER BY B.B_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE B_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT B_NO , B_TITLE , B_CONTENT , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH AS AT_FILE_PATH FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN B_ATTACHMENT A ON (B.B_NO = A.REF_BNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_MAIN = '1' ORDER BY B.COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < 5

SELECT B_NO , B.B_TITLE , B.B_CONTENT , A.ORIGIN_NAME , A.CHANGE_NAME , A.FILE_PATH AS AT_FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN B_ATTACHMENT A ON (B.B_NO = A.REF_BNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_MAIN = 2 AND CATEGORY_SUB = 1 ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT M.USER_NICKNAME AS M_USER_NAME, B.B_TITLE, B.B_CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE, LISTAGG(BA.FILE_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY BA.FILE_NO) AS BA_FILE_NO, LISTAGG(BA.ORIGIN_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY BA.ORIGIN_NAME) AS BA_ORIGIN_NAME, LISTAGG(BA.CHANGE_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY BA.CHANGE_NAME) AS BA_CHANGE_NAME, BA.FILE_PATH 커뮤니티경로, B.COUNT, B.B_NO FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN B_ATTACHMENT BA ON B.B_NO = BA.REF_BNO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE B.B_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY M.USER_NICKNAME, B.B_TITLE, B.B_CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE, BA.FILE_PATH, B.B_NO, B.COUNT

SELECT B_NO , B.B_TITLE , B.B_CONTENT , A.ORIGIN_NAME , A.CHANGE_NAME , A.FILE_PATH AS AT_FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN B_ATTACHMENT A ON (B.B_NO = A.REF_BNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET B_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, B_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, CREATE_DATE = SYSDATE, WHERE B_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE B_ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = #{originName}, CHANGE_NAME = #{changeName}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath}, CREATE_DATE = SYSDATE, WHERE REF_BNO = #{refBno} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT REP_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, USER_NICKNAME, M.FILE_PATH M_FILE_PATH, REP_NO, R.USER_NO FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = #{bNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY VALUES( SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{replyDesc}, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{userNo}, #{bNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT DOG_NAME, DOG_GENDER, DOG_BREED, DOG_BIRTHDAY, D.FILE_PATH FROM DOG D JOIN MEMBER M ON D.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN BOARD B ON M.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE B_NO = #{bNo} AND ROWNUM = 1
